summary: 2 men drag-racing across the U.S., in a '55 Chevy. Dennis Wilson's the mechanic, James Taylor's the driver.
cast: James Taylor|Warren Oates|Laurie Bird|Dennis Wilson|David Drake|Richard Ruth|Rudy Wurlitzer|Jaclyn Hellman|Bill Keller|Harry Dean Stanton|Don Samuels|Charles Moore|Tom Green|W.H. Harrison|Alan Vint|Illa Ginnaven|George Mitchell|A.J. Solari|Katherine Squire|Melissa Hellman|Jay Wheatley|James Mitchum|Kreag Caffey|Tom Witenbarger|Glen Rogers|Tomas Moore|Big Willie Robinson III
title: Carretera asfaltada en dos direcciones
